name: @olton/cake
title: Cake
description: Cake is a minimalist JavaScript library that parses, validates, manipulates, and displays strings for modern browsers with comfortable modern API.

scripts.build: rimraf -rf dist dist_cjs dist_es && npm run build-universal && npm run build-module
scripts.build-module: rollup -c config/rollup/module.cjs.all.js && rollup -c config/rollup/module.umd.js && rollup -c config/rollup/module.es.js && rollup -c config/rollup/module.es.all.js
scripts.prepare-npm-package: rm -rf dist_mod && mkdir dist_mod && cp package.json README.md LICENSE.md ./dist_mod && npm run build
